text: You need to analyze user activity data from your companyâ€™s mobile applications. Your team will use BigQuery for data analysis, transformation, and experimentation with ML algorithms. You need to ensure real-time ingestion of the user activity data into BigQuery. What should you do?

choices.text: Configure Pub/Sub to stream the data into BigQuery.
Run an Apache Spark streaming job on Dataproc to ingest the data into BigQuery.
Run a Dataflow streaming job to ingest the data into BigQuery.
Configure Pub/Sub and a Dataflow streaming job to ingest the data into BigQuery,
